mapper.select: select count(id) from submissions where task_id = #{taskId}
mapper.insert: insert into submissions (task_id, student_id, name) values (#{taskId}, #{studentId}, #{name})
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.name, IFNULL(s.task_id,0) as `count` FROM tasks t LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM submissions WHERE student_id = #{studentId}) s ON t.id = s.task_id where t.status = 1;
